title: League At 5-30fps Throughout The Game
body: I have no idea why League is lagging this bad, it's never been this bad before it usually works just fine but lately i cant even play custom bot games with only one other champion without missing half the things that are going on because it lags so badly. Nothing else on my computer lags this much. It's impossible to play PvP games because I'm only able to feed or just stay away in the jungle. Is this happening to anyone else? Does anyone more tech savvy than I know how to fix this problem?

replies.body:
There are a number of factors that could cause low FPS or fluctuations. Most of them are usually related to malfunctioning drivers or improper windows power settings. I strongly recommend working through our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as a starting point in resolving this.

Let me know if this issue persists through those steps.
